group.title: Building the new Hopper.com in 2018
group.author: Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.

group.title: Why we built a company before building a platform
group.author: Thiago Costa
group.excerpt: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.

group.title: Understanding the Gatsby lifecycle and how it impacts yout developer experience
group.author: Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: With the growing community interest in Gatsby, we hope to create more resources that make it easier for anyone to grasp the power of this incredible tool.

group.title: Why Narative loves Gatsby and Figma
group.author: Dennis Brotzky
group.excerpt: Creating a new website for Hopper, one of the top 4 most downloaded travel apps in the U.S, along with Uber, Lyft.

group.title: How Figma changed the way we design at Narative
group.author: Thiago Costa
group.excerpt: To understand why Figma is the best design tool for our company, you have to understand what we do. As a designer.
